education.school: Andhra Pradesh Board of Intermediate Education
The Board of Secondary Education of Andhra Pradesh

projects.name: Speech to Text in Deep Speech (TensorFlow)
projects.description: Implemented real-time speech-to-text conversion using TensorFlow and Deep Speech model. Utilized Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) for feature extraction and Recurrent Neural Networks (RNNs) for sequence prediction. Enhanced precision with advanced Natural Language Processing (NLP) techniques.

projects.name: RFID-Based Attendance System Using Arduino and Adafruit IoT
projects.description: Automated attendance tracking with RFID tags and Adafruit IoT, streamlining the process and reducing errors.

projects.name: Smart Traffic Management System Using AWS
projects.description: Designed and implemented a scalable traffic management system hosted on AWS. Configured static website hosting, managed permissions, and conducted testing for a seamless user experience.

experiences.role_name: Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning Virtual Internship
experiences.description: Gained hands-on experience in supervised, unsupervised, and semi-supervised learning, advanced models like CNNs and RNNs, and explored AI applications in computer vision and natural language processing.

Trained in MERN stack for full-stack web development, focusing on e-commerce projects. Achieved 80% growth in web development using MERN stack skills. Led a team, resulting in a 60% improvement in the e-commerce project using the MERN stack.
